p: The growth rate, λ, of the first epidemic was 1.03 (90%CI: 1.018–1.037), and was 1.01 (90%CI: 1.010–1.011) for the second epidemic ( Table 3). Given the observed serial intervals, R 0 of dog rabies was estimated as 2.42 (90%CI: 1.94–2.91) for the first epidemic, and 1.50 (90%CI: 1.48–1.52) for the second ( Table 3).
